titleStmt.title: A snake in the grass, caught and crusht, or, A third and last epistle to a now furious deacon in the Church of England, the Reverend Mr. George Keith with some remarks on my former epistles to him, especially that against plunging in baptism / by Trepidantium Malleus.
titleStmt.author: Trepidantium Malleus.
Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
